rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall designed for welcoming guests with natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles by aligning the entry with the auspicious direction.
Modern living area featuring comfortable seating and ample lighting. Large windows to promote air circulation in accordance with local building norms.
Dining space integrated within the living room design to foster family interaction while allowing sufficient natural light.
Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, designed for ease of movement and efficient workflow. Placed in the northeast direction as per Vastu.
Separate bathroom accessible from the kitchen and living areas to maintain privacy and hygiene.
Small utility area for storage of cleaning supplies or extra appliances.
